posts.post_content:
I've a number of lessor conditioned T205s which I am interested in trading for pre-war hits to my want list [url]http://www.oldbaseball.com/wantlists/bdonaldson.htm[/url] - I could also be tempted to trade for some pre-war cards lmk what you got.

I can send scans of all cards.

thanks

Bob
